actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that commissions received by employees of the House of Representatives barber shop shall be treated the same as basic pay for civil service retirement purposes.

summary.text: Includes the tips and commissions received by an employee of the House of Representatives barbershop as basic pay for civil service retirement purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that commissions received by employees of the House of Representatives barber shop shall be treated the same as basic pay for civil service retirement purposes.
